about.title: ABOUT ELMAHER TRADE COMPANY
about.subtitle: A Success Story and a Continuing Journey
about.line1: In line with the strategic planning of the new republic in the use of clean energy.
about.line2: Al Maher Group of Companies is moving in the same rational direction as the state by working to provide light personal transportation that runs on gas and electricity
about.line3: We dream of a 100% Egyptian product in Egypt and the rest of the African continent
